verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w their|strong="H3947"\w* vestments, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* unction, \w a|strong="H3947"\w* calf \w for|strong="H0854"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w basket|strong="H5536"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0168"\w* thou shalt \w gather|strong="H6950"\w* \w together|strong="H6950"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* all \w the|strong="H0853"\w* multitude being \w gathered|strong="H6950"\w* \w together|strong="H6950"\w* \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*,

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* immediately \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H7126"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*,

\w He|strong="H5414"\w* vested \w the|strong="H0853"\w* high priest \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* strait linen \w garment|strong="H3801"\w*, girding \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* girdle, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w putting|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* violet tunick, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* binding \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* girdle, \w he|strong="H5414"\w* fitted \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rational, \w on|strong="H5921"\w* which \w was|strong="H5414"\w* Doctrine \w and|strong="H0853"\w* Truth.

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* mitre \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* mitre \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* forehead, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w plate|strong="H6731"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w consecrated|strong="H6944"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* sanctification, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w also|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* unction, \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* furniture thereof.

\w And|strong="H4196"\w* \w when|strong="H4480"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w had|strong="H0853"\w* \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* \w and|strong="H4196"\w* sprinkled \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w*, \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* thereof, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w laver|strong="H3595"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* foot thereof, \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w oil|strong="H4886"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7218"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w poured|strong="H3332"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w consecrated|strong="H6942"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* after \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* vested \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* linen tunicks, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w girded|strong="H2296"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* girdles, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w put|strong="H3847"\w* mitres \w on|strong="H3847"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0853"\w* offered \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* calf \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H0853"\w* \w put|strong="H5066"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* thereof,

\w He|strong="H5414"\w* immolated \w it|strong="H5414"\w*: \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* dipping \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w finger|strong="H0676"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*, \w he|strong="H5414"\w* touched \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w*. \w Which|strong="H7161"\w* being expiated, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w*, \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w poured|strong="H3332"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rest \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* bottom thereof.

\w But|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w entrails|strong="H7130"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* caul \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w liver|strong="H3516"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* little \w kidneys|strong="H3629"\w*, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w burnt|strong="H6999"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* calf \w with|strong="H8313"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w dung|strong="H6569"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* without \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0853"\w* \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w a|strong="H7126"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H7126"\w* holocaust: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H0853"\w* \w put|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*,

\w He|strong="H0853"\w* immolated \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* poured \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* thereof \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* cutting \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* into \w pieces|strong="H5409"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* thereof, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* joints, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fat \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w burnt|strong="H6999"\w* \w in|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fire,

Having first \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w entrails|strong="H7130"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* feet, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* together \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* upon \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w because|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* holocaust \w of|strong="H3068"\w* most sweet odour \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0853"\w* \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w consecration|strong="H4394"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* priests: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w put|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* thereof:

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w when|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* immolated \w it|strong="H5414"\w*, \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* thereof, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* touched \w the|strong="H5921"\w* tip \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w thumb|strong="H0931"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w like|strong="H7272"\w* manner \w also|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* great \w toe|strong="H0931"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*.

\w He|strong="H4480"\w* \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* \w also|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ram \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w was|strong="H4872"\w* immolated, \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* touched \w the|strong="H0853"\w* tip \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w every|strong="H5439"\w* \w one|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w thumbs|strong="H0931"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* great \w toes|strong="H0931"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rest \w he|strong="H4480"\w* poured \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rump, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* covereth \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w entrails|strong="H7130"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* caul \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w liver|strong="H3516"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kidneys|strong="H3629"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* shoulder, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* separated.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w taking|strong="H3947"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w basket|strong="H5536"\w*; \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w loaf|strong="H2471"\w* without leaven, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w cake|strong="H2471"\w* tempered \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w wafer|strong="H7550"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* shoulder,

Delivering \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*: wile having \w lifted|strong="H5130"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* again \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* holocaust, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* oblation \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w consecration|strong="H4394"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* sweet odour \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H6999"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.
